Comment: The search for the second weakness... this could be an appropriate tittle to this game, as early as move 12.a4! I sacrificed a pawn to block black's position and he retained that pawn advantage for most of the remaining game, black position deteriorated and he had several weak pawns that managed to defend, until I by careful maneuvering managed to push my passed pawn and dismantled black's defence, by move 34, I regained the material balance in an advantageous position and proceeded to win the resulting Q+R vs Q+R endgame, that I was able to simplify in to a won rooks plus two extra pawns endgame...
